medzoo.common.medloaders.medical_image_process.percentile_clip(img_numpy, min_val=0.1, max_val=99.8)[source]¶

Intensity normalization based on percentile Clips the range based on the quarile values.

Args: min_val: should be in the range [0,100] max_val: should be in the range [0,100]

Returns

intesity normalized image

medzoo.common.medloaders.medical_loader_utils module¶

medzoo.common.medloaders.medical_loader_utils.create_sub_volumes(*ls, dataset_name, mode, samples, full_vol_dim, crop_size, sub_vol_path, normalization='max_min', th_percent=0.1)[source]¶

[summary]

Parameters

  • ls – list of modality paths, where the last path is the segmentation map

  • dataset_name – which dataset is used

  • mode – train/val

  • samples – train/val samples to generate

  • full_vol_dim – full image size

  • crop_size – train volume size

  • sub_vol_path – path for the particular patient

  • th_percent – the % of the croped dim that corresponds to non-zero labels

  • crop_type –

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]
